review: Install went fine ,but didn't function at all when I tried to play any apps .
author: Peter B.

review: The dual-band wifi really helps with congested neighborhoods, and the remote is very responsive. My only complaints are really limited to the content available for streaming that is included with Prime, and that the media control buttons are transposed with the OS control buttons (regarding where my fingers expect them).
author: Hari

review: Fast response and good picture quality. No complaints at all.
author: Jets

review: So easy to use. Love it.
author: mez

review: First of all I want to say that I love my Fire stick. It handles most everything perfectly. I have had a few hiccups with buffering (I am using it on a tv a floor away from the router) that I didn't seem to have with my chromecast.  This could be due to some new outside interference and not the fault of the Fire stick. I will retest with the Chromecast and see if the buffering issues persist. With that being said I could not be happier with the Fire stick. I would recommend it to anyone.
author: The Toff

review: Simple setupA breeze to useBrings new life to old apps
